reviewText: Not at all what I expected. Very little usable history--far too brief.
Very prompt!  Got it just before I needed it.  I teach Humanities and it holds their attention while they learn!

Produced for television, this presentation allows the viewer to see, feel, hear and understand the tribulation through which the early Church marched in the Roman Empire.  An amazing presentation that pacts a tremendous amount of material in a very short time.  Visual images are great but the commentary and remarks of those interviewed make the presentation.
